message.body: Hi###### it is Ingrid. I am in charge of the exhibitions at the new second fl of Vetri now and they want to pay someone to install the wall mounts for paintings -there are 6. This is a one time gig, as I don't plan on altering the arrangement. Just hangings for heavy paintings. Attached is the diagram:
ï¿¼
The walls are normal drywall I suppose. I will find out.
If you are interested in doing this, let me know, and let me know how much you would want to be paid. It shouldn't take more than 2 hours, and I will buy the supplies.
Vetri would be paying you, so you can meet their staff too, which might be fun for you (as you are a good cook).
Hi before I give you an answer, what is the date/time the show will be installed?
Also how much do the paintings weigh?
I'm flexible with install
It starts whenever I want it to. Since I have my own show at the Crane this month, I would say December...
Well, the paintings I have scheduled for the first exhibition are not heavy at all- BUT I want to only do the wall mountings Once and keep reusing them for all future work
So as much weight as they can carry, would be ideal
I can install the anchors for ##### if it's drywall I'll bring the anchors them because I
Have them
Probably can carry up to 75-80 lbs
So do the paintings hung on
Wire
Yup
Sorry I'm trying to text while doing something
You don't need me until December, is that correct?
Also, is it at the crane building?
No at second floor of Vetri
Where is that?
Oh it's a restaurant
Yes it's a restaurant
